reviews.content: I moved out of state for a while but when I came back I made sure to find Dr Hanna! Such a sweet lady and she really cares! Her entire staff and her all work together to make for a personal and professional visit. Very nice office as well!

Apparently my two previous reviews about this practice did not provide enough detail about how atrocious this doctor is and instead of letting it lie, they continue to make it worse by having yelp continue to remove it.  You want detail?  Here is detail:. 1) the office is unkempt and unwelcoming. 2) the doctor's husband mans the front desk and he is unprofessional by giving unsolicited medical advice and teasing patients as if they were his peers. 3) the doctor is very focused on making sure that you schedule appointments continuously for medications which you take regularly and for which no other doctor has ever asked me to go in every few months, thus making it seem as if she is very financially focused.  Furthermore she is very pushy about annual physicals letting you know that the insurance pays for it every year, again making it seem that she is very financially focused.. 4) in my experience, she wants to schedule lots of unnecessary appointments for minor things in order to charge.. 5) if you don't believe me do some research online with her name and the word "reviews" and you will see that there is much consistency in my review.. Finally, if this is not enough detail, and my review gets erased again, I will be more than happy to continue to finesse my review to contain more and more details of my horrible experience until yelp accepts it, because I have a right to warn others about my particular very poor experience with this practice so that they can find a better doctor, which is the point of reviews.  You asked for more detail?  Your wish is my command.  Skip this doctor.

I first saw Dr Nadia Hanna when she was with First Physicians Group and really enjoyed her thoroughness and kindness. When I learned that she had finally opened her own private practice as Sarasota Primary Care (. ), I was so happy for her. I highly recommend Dr Hanna to anyone looking for an excellent, caring Primary Care Physician, as I saw her today and can attest that she is alive and well and in a very nice new office at 3333 Clark Rd.
